Talents no longer require a skill point to level
Now talents are learned by using their own talent points available at levels 10, 15, 20, 25, 27, 28, 29, and 30
This results in all +2 All Attributes bonuses skilled by level 22
All Facets that used to have 6 All Attributes bonuses now have 7 bonuses again

generic.note: Tier 4 Towers now have a Barracks Reinforcement buff. Each allied barracks that has not been destroyed provides +4 armor to both Tier 4 towers
Bonus is for each individual building, totaling in +24 Armor for 6 Barracks
Assist Gold Formula Reworked
OLD: 60 + ( ( VictimNetworth * 0.037 ) / NumHeroes )
NEW: 15 + ( ( 50 + ( VictimNetworth * 0.037 ) ) / NumHeroes )

Invulnerability targeting rules of certain items and abilities have been updated
Most items and abilities that previously could target and/or affect invulnerable units no longer do so
The following spells have been changed:
Items
Nullifier's Nullify can no longer target invulnerable units
Neutral Creeps
Satyr Banisher's Purge can no longer target invulnerable units
Heroes
Dark Seer's Vacuum no longer affects invulnerable units
Naga Siren's Ensnare can no longer target invulnerable units unless this invulnerability is provided by Song of the Siren
Ogre Magi's Bloodlust can no longer target invulnerable units
Can still target invulnerable buildings (i.e. Tier 2-4 towers when the previous ones are not destroyed)
Oracle's Fortune's End can no longer target invulnerable units, but does affect invulnerable units in the radius
Shadow Demon's Demonic Purge can no longer target invulnerable units
Shadow Demon's Demonic Cleanse can no longer target invulnerable units
Sniper's Assassinate can no longer target invulnerable units
Sven's Storm Hammer with Aghanim's Scepter can no longer target invulnerable units, but does affect invulnerable units in the radius
Vengeful Spirit's Nether Swap can no longer target invulnerable units
Since Cyclone effects also make the unit invulnerable, all changes mentioned above apply to them as well. As a result, there are these special cases:
Nullifier's Nullify will dispel Cyclone off the target immediately if Cyclone was cast on a unit already affected by the Nullify debuff
Oracle's Fortune's End cannot target Cycloned units, but will dispel Cyclone off the units in AoE around the target
Sven's Storm Hammer with Aghanim's Scepter cannot target Cycloned units, but will dispel Cyclone off the units in AoE around the target
All three of these will also dispel Cyclone if the spell projectile was launched (or started channeling) before the target got Cycloned

hero_notes.note: Now counts as a Universal melee hero instead of a creep in the following cases

Roshan's Banner, Clinkz' Skeleton Archers, Lich's Ice Spire, Phoenix's Supernova, Pugna's Nether Ward, Templar Assassin's Psionic Traps, and Undying's Tombstone
Spirit Bear already did hero damage to Shadow Shaman's Mass Serpent Wards, Couriers, Observer Wards and Sentry Wards
Spirit Bear can now be targeted or affected as a hero by the following abilities:

Axe's Culling Blade, Bounty Hunter's Track, Earth Spirit's Petrify, Legion Commander's Duel, Lion's Finger of Death, Mars' Spear of Mars, Necrophos' Reaper's Scythe, Slark's Pounce, Terrorblade's Reflection, Terrorblade's Sunder (only if the Bear is not Debuff Immune), and Underlord's Atrophy Aura

Now can also break enemy Smoke of Deceit

Charges for Urn of Shadows and its upgrades, Pudge's permanent Strength from Flesh Heap, Silencer's permanent Int from Brain Drain, Slark's permanent Agility from Essence Shift, and Storm Spirit's stacks for Galvanized
